## AnonymousCartSignInMode enum

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum AnonymousCartSignInMode 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  MergeWithExistingCustomerCart | <code>&quot;MergeWithExistingCustomerCart&quot;</code> | <code>LineItem</code>s of the anonymous cart will be copied to the customer’s active cart that has been modified most recently.<!-- -->The <code>CartState</code> of the anonymous cart gets changed to <code>Merged</code> while the <code>CartState</code> of the customer’s cart remains <code>Active</code>.<code>CustomLineItems</code> and <code>CustomFields</code> of the anonymous cart will not be copied to the customers cart.<!-- -->If a <code>LineItem</code> in the anonymous cart matches an existing line item in the customer’s cart (same product ID and variant ID), the maximum quantity of both LineItems is used as the new quantity. In that case <code>CustomFields</code> on the <code>LineItem</code> of the anonymous cart will not be in the resulting <code>LineItem</code>. |
|  UseAsNewActiveCustomerCart | <code>&quot;UseAsNewActiveCustomerCart&quot;</code> | The anonymous cart is used as new active customer cart. No <code>LineItem</code>s get merged. |
